No study date evaluate protective effect acetazolamide NAC cisplatin nephrotoxicity human . Aim study evaluate effect acetazolamide NAC cisplatin nephrotoxicity human compare mannitol . Patients method . A total 52 patient receive standard hydration measure cisplatin randomize three group : 20 patient receive mannitol , 15 patient receive acetazolamide 17 patient receive NAC . Patients ` kidney function monitor use serum creatinine , creatinine clearance blood urea nitrogen ; kidney injury assess use RIFLE criterion . Patients ` liver function test hematological parameter also monitor .
